item.title: Announcements
item.description: /c/Announcements on discuss.online https://discuss.online/c/announcements Description Community updates and announcements. Admins will post any updates here so be sure to follow! Important updates will be pinned to the local feed. Details * Subscribers 7 Posts 5 Comments 11 Daily Active Users 4 Weekly Active Users 5 Monthly Active Users 5 Published 2023-06-09 04:02:55 Updated 2023-06-14 22:39:59 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:14

item.title: BattleBit Remastered
item.description: /c/BattleBit Remastered on discuss.online https://discuss.online/c/battlebit Description Discussions regarding [BattleBit_Remastered](https://store.steampowered.com/app/671860/BattleBit_Remastered/). Early access is open, so sign up now! # Looking for a mod I created this community out of interest in the game. However, I'm not going to be able to manage it long-term. I'd love to hand off moderation to someone invested in this game. Details * Subscribers 2 Posts 5 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 0 Weekly Active Users 0 Monthly Active Users 0 Published 2023-06-15 13:10:18 Updated 2023-06-16 04:20:48 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:14

item.title: Discuss
item.description: /c/Discuss on discuss.online https://discuss.online/c/discuss Description # Welcome Open discussions and thoughts. Make anything into a discussion! # Rules 1. Follow the rules of discuss.online 2. No porn 3. No self-promotion Details * Subscribers 8 Posts 10 Comments 22 Daily Active Users 6 Weekly Active Users 6 Monthly Active Users 6 Published 2023-06-12 17:31:45 Updated 2023-06-16 06:13:39 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:14

item.title: Lemmy Moderation Tools
item.description: /c/Lemmy Moderation Tools on discuss.online https://discuss.online/c/lemmy_mod_tools Description # Welcome I'm working on a moderation tool to work with Lemmy. I'm still in early development and discovery. This channel will update the status and respond to questions during development, testing, release, and post-release. [Join us on Matrix!](https://matrix.to/#/#lemmy_moderation_tool:discuss.online) Details * Subscribers 16 Posts 4 Comments 5 Daily Active Users 0 Weekly Active Users 0 Monthly Active Users 0 Published 2023-06-15 12:53:28 Updated 2023-06-15 23:21:17 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:14

item.title: New Here
item.description: /c/New Here on discuss.online https://discuss.online/c/new_here Description For all the new folks to post and asked questions. You can still ask if you've been here a while too. If you're a veteran you're welcome too! Post tips and tricks as you use Lemmy! Details * Subscribers 3 Posts 2 Comments 11 Daily Active Users 2 Weekly Active Users 5 Monthly Active Users 5 Published 2023-06-09 04:19:32 Updated 2023-06-14 22:39:45 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:14

item.title: Old people internet
item.description: /c/Old people internet on discuss.online https://discuss.online/c/chainmail Description # Welcome This is a great place to share the ridiculous things your in-laws or parents send you. We cannot help but ask ourselves why they think it's interesting. # Rules 1. Post must include who sent it to you. 2. Follow discuss.online code of conduct. 3. No porn! 4. Use the NFSW tag when something isn't appropriate for all audiences. Details * Subscribers 9 Posts 5 Comments 4 Daily Active Users 2 Weekly Active Users 2 Monthly Active Users 2 Published 2023-06-13 20:52:28 Updated 2023-06-13 21:00:52 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:14

item.title: Playing With Power MTG (Official)
item.description: /c/Playing With Power MTG (Official) on discuss.online https://discuss.online/c/playing_w_power_mtg Description # Welcome Hey, welcome to the **Official Playing With Power MTG Lemmy community!** Glad to have you here! # Rules Rule 0: The Goose rule This rule encompasses all other areas deemed inappropriate for an MTG server, but aren't explicitly defined here. A rule may sometimes be hard to define, but you know the infraction when you see it. If it honks like a goose.

item.title: To The Fediverse
item.description: /c/To The Fediverse on discuss.online https://discuss.online/c/fediverse Description # Welcome Let's talk about the [fediverse](https://www.fediverse.to/). The fediverse is a collection of community-owned, ad-free, decentralised, and privacy-centric social networks. Each fediverse instance is managed by a human admin. You can find fediverse instances dedicated to art, music, technology, culture, or politics. **Join the growing community and experience the web as it was meant to be.** Details * Subscribers 3 Posts 1 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 0 Weekly Active Users 0 Monthly Active Users 0 Published 2023-06-15 16:54:58 Updated 1969-12-31 19:00:00 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:14
